Class ArabicToRomanConverterModel

java.lang.Object
ArabicToRomanConverterModel
public class ArabicToRomanConverterModel extends Object
this is the model for the GUI that represents the data for the program. It implements methods that the controller will call to perform data manipulation in response to view interactions
Version:
1.0.0, 23, Oct 2024
Author:
Scott Peasron

    • setArabicNum

      public void setArabicNum(int arabicNum)
      Sets the Arabic number and validates the input. If valid, it updates the corresponding Roman numeral
      Parameters:
      arabicNum - arabicNum the Arabic number to be converted to a Roman numeral
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Arabic number is out the valid range (1 to 3999)

    • setRomanNumeral

      public void setRomanNumeral(String romanNumeral)
      Sets the Roman numeral and validates the input. If valid, it updates the corresponding Arabic number
      Parameters:
      romanNumeral - the Roman numeral to be converted to an Arabic number
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Roman numeral is invalid

      public static boolean isValid(String romanString)
      Validates whether provided Roman numeral is a valid string
      Parameters:
      romanString - the Roman numeral string to validate
      Returns:
